description: Nobody ever misses a day's work when well-hung European studs Francesco D'Macho and Tim Kruger are on the job. These two uncut studs need a break so when all-American Kyle King comes in with some beers the only thing King will be sucking are the monsters between the top dog's legs. D'Macho strips to reveal a chiseled, hairy torso - the perfect compliment to Kruger's smooth white skin. The action heats up when King just keeps begging for more - luckily these two men have got what it takes to please him. Giant cocks and powerful sexual energy!
title: Wood Work
